text:
June 25, 1959
Dr. Harry K. Skornia
Executive Director
HAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I received a call from Irv Merrill sometime after
I talked to you. He is very much interested in the Title
job. I take it that he would not be unhappy to leave
and that he finds the money attractive. I do
not know whether it is too late for you to do anything
about this - or whether you want to - but am passing on
the information.
Just talked to Harwood too. He would vote for Westley,
Kumata, Merrill â€” in that order. He is definitely not
interested.
It was good talking to you.
Best,
SLB:mw
Samuel L. Becker
Chairman, NAEB
Research Committee
